parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the SSL client certificate.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**. Valid values: **1** to **50**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the SSL client certificate.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the SSL client certificate belongs.

The SSL client certificate and its associated SSL server belong to the same resource group. You can call the [DescribeSslVpnServers](~~2794078~~) operation to query the ID of the resource group to which the SSL server belongs.

parameters.name: SslVpnClientCertId
parameters.description: The ID of the SSL client certificate.

parameters.name: SslVpnServerId
parameters.description: The ID of the SSL server.
